issues.title: 2025-08-18 至 2025-08-24 周报 / Weekly
issues.summaryCN: 本周经严核的科技/IT大事件精选。
issues.summaryEN: Verified, cross-sourced tech/IT developments for the week.

items.title: 苹果修补被利用零日 / Apple patches exploited zero-day
factsCN: 苹果发布 iOS/iPadOS 18.6.2、iPadOS 17.7.10 与 macOS 15.6.1/14.7.8/13.7.8，修复 ImageIO 越界写 CVE-2025-43300；苹果称可能在定向攻击中被利用。
factsEN: Apple released iOS/iPadOS 18.6.2, iPadOS 17.7.10 and macOS 15.6.1/14.7.8/13.7.8 to fix ImageIO OOB write CVE-2025-43300, which Apple says may have been exploited in targeted attacks.

image.caption: Apple 发布安全更新修补 CVE-2025-43300

items.whyCN: 零日涉及广泛 Apple 终端，需尽快更新以降低被定向攻击利用的风险。
items.whyEN: A widely deployed Apple stack zero-day; rapid patching reduces exposure to targeted attacks.

items.title: NVIDIA 推出 Spectrum-XGS / NVIDIA unveils Spectrum-XGS
factsCN: NVIDIA 在 Hot Chips 宣布 Spectrum-XGS，以 Ethernet “scale-across” 连接多数据中心，构建统一 AI 集群；CoreWeave 将率先部署。
factsEN: At Hot Chips, NVIDIA announced Spectrum-XGS ‘scale-across’ Ethernet to link multiple data centers into a unified AI cluster; CoreWeave will adopt early.
items.whyCN: 跨数据中心以太方案有望成为大规模 AI 训练/推理的新网络基建选项。
items.whyEN: Signals Ethernet-based, multi-DC fabrics as a contender for large-scale AI networking.

items.title: 微软释出紧急修复 / Microsoft ships OOB reset fix
factsCN: 微软针对 8 月补丁导致“重置此电脑/通过 Windows Update 修复”失效问题发布 OOB 修复（KB5066188/KB5066189）；并确认 NDI 流媒体性能回退为已知问题。
factsEN: Microsoft issued out-of-band fixes (KB5066188/KB5066189) for Reset/Recovery failures from the August update, and acknowledged NDI streaming performance regressions as a known issue.

keyInfo.impact: 功能回退 + OOB 修复

image.caption: 微软发布 OOB 修复并记录 NDI 已知问题

items.whyCN: 涉及系统重置与内容制作工作流，IT 管理与直播/教育行业需及时跟进修复与临时规避。
items.whyEN: Impacts reset/recovery and NDI workflows—IT and media/education should apply the OOB fix or workarounds.

items.title: Zoom 修复高危 Windows 提权漏洞 / Zoom fixes Windows EoP
factsCN: Zoom 公布并修复 Windows 客户端不受信任搜索路径漏洞 CVE-2025-49457（CVSS 9.6）。
factsEN: Zoom disclosed and patched Windows untrusted search path issue CVE-2025-49457 (CVSS 9.6).
